metadata.title: CVE-2021-47372 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:macb: fix use after free on rmmod plat_dev->dev->platform_data is releasedby platform_device_unregister(), use of pclk and hclk is a use-after-free.Since device unregister won't need a clk device we adjust the function callsequence to fix this issue. [ 31.261225] BUG: KASAN: use-after-free inmacb_remove+0x77/0xc6 [macb_pci] [ 31.275563] Freed by task 306: [30.276782] platform_device_release+0x25/0x80
